content.description: A very nice corner, similar to Lichen it A lot on Cathedral.
content.location: on the Bacon Buttress about 20 minutes west from the Clear Cut area, left facing corner. the obvious streaked wall

content.description: Somewhat bold start up to a bolt, then a nice finger crack to trees. Good rock, at a roadside cliff, this would be a popular climb.
content.protection: some wires and small cams, tree belay/lower
content.location: Clearcut Crag, left of Hawk Food about 50'

content.description: Boulder up to a horizontal crack and ALMOST get a good cam- quick face move to jugs. A hand crack with jugs leads to the top
content.protection: A couple of cams 1"-2.5". Tree rap/lower
content.location: At the Clear Cut crag, an obvious short wall just beyond the main wall. Leads and TR's 50 '

content.description: After a massive cleaning, this not bad finger and hand crack was discovered. With more cleaning, it will be a decent climb.
content.location: Far left side of the Clear Cut Crag, crack in a small right facing corner

content.description: Main cliff , far left side. A 5.7 slab ( no pro) up to a short finger crack- step right into the ominous leaning flare, if you survive a nice belay is awaiting you. George CRUISED this and I fell 3 times seconding and nearly puked at the top. Still 10+. The direct start in a short groove to the right of the finger crack 11B stemming which I flashed .
content.protection: small cams and some biggies-Ithink one bong is fixed. Tree and fixed nut rap
content.location: One of the only obvious routes on the far left

content.description: Crux near the top. Nice climbing on good rock, never set it up for leading as the TR is casual but 3-4 bolts ??
content.location: Center of the Clearcut Crag, the smoothest face

content.description: A nice sustained thin crack on good rock.
content.protection: wires and small cams, tree belay
content.location: Clearcut Crag, just left of Mice-

content.description: Nice and sunny. Easy hiking in yet very secluded.3 cliffs, the main one has very limited routes (only 2 that I know of ), the clear cut has about 8 short lines and the Bacon Buttress has 2 routes.   We did about 4-5 other routes than the ones listed some tr and some lead.
